testcase.name: To Test the Login Functionality of Tricentis
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the after login home page.....................................passed When I click on the login link..............................................passed And I will enter the "user@gmail.com" in Email tab..........................passed And I will enter the "user" in Password tab.................................passed And I will click on the Login button........................................passed Then It should get login and show "success".................................passed

testcase.name: To test the Search Functionality of Tricentis Search bar
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the home page.................................................passed When I type "science" in search textbox.....................................passed And I click on the search button............................................passed
